name: ZUG
description:
WASD to more

Z to interact

~~~

Life is a drag. The trick is to find the right hook. Swim to find your own meaning beneath the waves in this short fishy adventure.

Play in browser or in your favorite ROM Emulator for GameBoy titles.

WARNING: Music might be a little loud. Also, the song is distorted. The original is cleaner.

Made using the GB Studio.
